work.name: University of Maine, Spatial Computing Dept
work.summary: Building the future of engineering education in immersive virtual makerspaces.

work.name: Farmhand Automation, Inc
work.summary: Built the first affordable autonomous robotic platform for sustainable small scale farms. With a team of five designed an autonomous rover completely constructed using digital fabrication processes, capable of seeding and weeding crops, and costing less than a typical tractor.

work.name: iUNU Technologies
work.summary: Led team of 30 engineers across software, hardware, and computer vision to develop the first AI powered inventory management system for living crops grown under greenhouses.

work.name: Western Growers Association
work.summary: Western Growers represents the agricultural region of the Salinas Valley, responsible for growing roughly 70% of U.S. produce. Acted as liason between WGA and Silicon Valley Startups and developed strategic plan for tech adoption.

work.name: Forager
work.summary: Lead the development, strategy, and product for an online marketplace serving the local food economy and empowering sustainable agriculture.

work.name: Bee Informed Partnership, UMD
work.summary: Designed citizen science application for crowdsourcing honey bee health and activity information from across the country. Used in data analysis for multiple USDA / NIFA honey bee health monitoring programs.

work.name: Apiara Hive Technologies
work.summary: Designed and built the first low cost wifi bee hive monitoring for the beekeeping industry. Hive weigth data logger capable of detecting colony productivity and health issues.

awards.title: NSF Graduate Research Fellowship
awards.summary: Recognized by the National Science Foundation for my committment to graduate research in expanding access to engineering education in rural and underserved communities.

awards.title: Clean Energy Innovation Award
awards.summary: Awarded $250,000 by the state of Maine for innovation in the field of clean technology and sustainable agriculture.
